p.d: Russia, the 1990s. Polina, a promising ballerina, is about to join the prestigious Bolshoi Ballet. But, captivated by a modern dance performance, she decides to abandon everything to join the talented choreographer Liria Elsaj in France. Directed by: Angelin Preljocaj, Valérie Müller (France, 2015) Cast: Anastasia Shevtsova (Polina), Niels Schneider (Adrien), Juliette Binoche (Liria Elsaj), Jérémie Bélingard (Karl), Aleksei Guskov (Bojinski), Veronika Zhovnytska (Polina as a child), Sergio Diaz (Sergio), Miglen Mirtchev (Anton) Genre: drama Awards: American Student Award (COLCOA 2017)
